description: a wrapper to the unix getent utility

fail_key.description: If a supplied key is missing this will make the task fail if True

split.description: character used to split the database values into lists/arrays such as ':' or '	', otherwise  it will try to pick one depending on the database

key.description: key from which to return values from the specified database, otherwise the full contents are returned.

database.description: the name of a getent database supported by the target system (passwd, group, hosts, etc).
